  • Constructor Details

    • CreateSettingsModeController

      public CreateSettingsModeController()

  • Method Details

    • fill

      public void fill()
      Fills the user interface component with a list of room types retrieved from the database. This method initializes a RoomTypeModel to fetch all available room types from the database, creates an ObservableList from the retrieved room types, and sets this list as the items for the roomsTypesList user interface component.
      Specified by:
      fill in interface ModeControllerInterface

    • clickedCancel

      public void clickedCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

    • loadScene

      protected void loadScene(String fxml, User user)
      Overrides:
      loadScene in class AbstractController

    • onItemClicked

      public void onItemClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Handles the event when an item is clicked in the user interface. This method creates a new Room object based on the selected room type from the roomsTypesList. If a room of the selected type already exists in the usersRoomsList, a unique name is generated for the new room by appending a numerical suffix. The new room is then added to the usersRoomsList.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the MouseEvent representing the mouse click event that triggered this method.

    • ItemDoubleClick

      public void ItemDoubleClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Handles the event when an item is double-clicked in the user interface. If the mouse event represents a double click (i.e., getClickCount() == 2), the method removes the selected room from the usersRoomsList and clears the nameOfRoomField. If the mouse event represents a single click (i.e., getClickCount() == 1), the method updates the nameOfRoomField with the title of the selected room for potential editing.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the MouseEvent representing the mouse click event that triggered this method.

    • renameRoom

      public void renameRoom(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Renames the selected room with the new name provided in the nameOfRoomField. If the new name is already assigned to another room, an error message is displayed.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the ActionEvent representing the action event that triggered this method.

    • createApartment

      public void createApartment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws ApartmentNotAddedException, RoomNotAddedException
      Creates a new apartment based on the information provided in the user interface fields. If the apartment name is not provided or already exists, appropriate error messages are displayed.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the ActionEvent representing the action event that triggered this method.
      Throws:
      ApartmentNotAddedException - if an error occurs while adding the apartment to the database.
      RoomNotAddedException - if an error occurs while adding a room to the database.
